channel.title: Helpith me! XD
channel.description: ok i need help i have heard some one can change in to a npc so i need some one to help me what is the code for it ??

item.title: Helpith me! XD
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

Read full topic
